prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that resembles a plant with vibrant green leaves and a yellow flower.
I want to design a whimsical Pokemon that has a long, slender body and bright colors that stand out.
Generate a tiny Pokemon with a unique flower-like head and green, leafy appendages.
Show me a cute, small grass-type creature that thrives in forest environments.
Imagine a Pokemon that can camouflage itself among plants, featuring a yellow and green color scheme.
Make a Pokemon with a bell-shaped head and a plant-like body, perfect for battles in nature.
Give me a Pokemon that has characteristics of a flower and a vine, emphasizing its grass-type abilities.
